titleStmt.title: Memoirs of Emeric count Teckely in four books, wherein are related all the most considerable transactions in Hungary and the Ottoman Empire, from his birth, anno 1656, till after the Battel of Salankement, in the year 1691 / translated out of French.
Histoire d'Emeric, comte de Tekeli. English
titleStmt.author: Le Clerc, Jean, 1657-1736.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of text.
Translation of: Histoire d'Emeric, comte de Tekeli, ou memoires pour servir à sa vie. Cologne, 1693.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
